data.message:
Hi . I love FB too but today FB disapointed me :( I made a video and tried to post it om my wall but it was removed and when I tried again I was blocked !! the reason they say it's not my video . But it is !!!!
I've made the video using photos that I designed . photos that have the logo of a page that I manage . I've appealed but didn't get any answer . I've worked hard on my video and I wish that someone help me to get  the reinstate on My video .

replies.message:
You've judged me Freddy  and called me a liar . thank you for your kindness . when I tried to post the video from an old page of mine it wasn't aproved but when I appealed it was reistated . but I didn't use that account since 8/2013 .   I want it on my active account .
God bless you freddy and try not to judge people specialy when you don't know all the facts
Thanks to whoever helped . I'm unblocked and my video was aproved and I posted it an hour ego =D
